members.name: selection
members.description: Use selection feedback generators to indicate a change in selection.

members.name: notification
members.description: Use this to indicate success/failure/warning to the user.

params.name: options
params.description: should be of the type { type: 'success' } (or 'warning'/'error')

members.name: impact
members.description: Use this to indicate success/failure/warning to the user.

params.name: options
params.description: should be of the type { style: 'light' } (or 'medium'/'heavy')
